title: doc: document that nil pointers as error sentinels are poor style
body:
willchan wrote:

On 2011/06/14 23:03:32, bradfitz wrote:
> nil as a sentinel value for "didn't do what you asked for" is
> verboten in Go. return (*Stream, os.Error) instead.

This is very useful to know. It makes sense too now that I think about it. Docs
for this would be great though.
